title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Joy Taylor fills in for Colin to discuss what makes Steph Curry special and different from most NBA stars and why that has led to 4 titles in 8 years. She praises James Harden for his decision to take less and have self-awareness about where he's at in this part of his career. She also shares which quarterbacks are under the most pressure next season. Plus, Emmanuel Acho from Speak For Yourself joins the show to debate if Baker Mayfield should play for the Browns again. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
